name: opennewspaper
description: OpenNewspaper is a web application designed to revolutionize the way users access and engage with news articles. Our platform offers a seamless and intuitive experience for discovering, reading, and sharing news from diverse sources. With a focus on user-friendliness and accessibility, OpenNewspaper is your go-to destination for staying informed about current events. OpenNewspaper use Rapid API for show you the latest article.

scripts.installpackages: npm run installbackend && npm run installfrontend
